name: Tri again
description:
Play as a triangle who must navigate 5 unforgiving levels and defend yourself against evil red shapes out to torment you. There are a variety of enemies all requiring skill to kill. Kill as many as you can and reach the yellow portal without getting yourself killed.

There is also a 10 wave mode for those who are up for the challenge...

The game is playable by using either using arrow keys or WASD to move whatever you prefer. And you can use the mouse button to shoot and kill all the enemies who are between you and the portal.

Spot any bugs in the game? Comment them below. Have any features or ideas for the game? Comment them below and i will see about adding them too the game

This game is my submission for the open source jam #1. Below as well as a download for the game you will  be able to download all the source code of the game. That means you will be able to create your own versions of the game or use some of the code in your own games. You can't resell the source code off as if it is your own though.
